description: This file contains utility functions for creating, logging, and managing audit events related to carousel interactions on the frontend. It includes functions to create audit payloads, log events (currently to console), and specifically log slide change interactions with relevant metadata.

methods.name: createAuditEvent({ action, component, metadata = {}, userId = 'anonymous' })
methods.description: Creates an audit event payload including timestamp, action, component, metadata, and userId.

methods.name: logAuditEvent(event)
methods.description: Logs an audit event to the console; intended for replacement with a transport layer in production.

methods.name: logSlideChange({ fromIndex, toIndex, total, userId = 'anonymous' })
methods.description: Convenience method for logging slide change interactions with related metadata.

ctags.name: createAuditEvent
ctags.pattern: /^export function createAuditEvent({ action, component, metadata = {}, userId = 'anonymous' }) {$/

ctags.name: logSlideChange
ctags.pattern: /^export function logSlideChange({ fromIndex, toIndex, total, userId = 'anonymous' }) {$/
